page.title: 19Paper Products,Paddock Wood
page.content: Scot Michie is a local firm which produces all kinds of stationery.They employ 65 people,75% of which come from Paddock Wood. 80% of the paper used come from the United Kingdom and 20% from Holland. Scot Michie has been operating in Paddock Wood since 1971. Paddock Wood is a most suitable place for this firm to be situated because there is easy access to motorways. They supply shops and department stores such as John Lewis,Harrods,W.H.Smith,Boots,Superdrug and John Menzies. Their products are exported to Europe,Scandinavia and Australia. They employ outworkers who put the ribbons on the boxos of stationery. Scot Michie use the name 'Papercraft' for their products.
